description:
In "Chickempic," the multiplayer mode of Viviter where you can play with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Vivid ViviCure" mini-game!
You're cornered now, Bad Guy! It's time to finish you off with my special move!
Rubbing vigorously to charge up the thunder! Gathering thunder energy right up to the limit!
Here we go! Vivid Thunder Blast!!!
Will the finishing move land?! The outcome of the battle isâ€”
name: Additional mini-game "Vivid ViviCure"
